page.title: 06Sunday at the Perry's
page.content: 10a.m.is a typical time for our family to have breakfast.We have toast and jam nearly every Sunday.Dad goes to work at 10-15 and I take the dog for a walk on Congleton Edge.My dad arrives home about 1p.m.We have a small lunch like soup,boiled egg or sandwiches and crisps.After lunch we get ready for the Dog Class.It is at 2pm.We leave at 3.30 for my Nana's house.My aunty,uncle and cousin also visit my grandparents.Everyone has Sunday dinner there.We stay until 8pm.When we arrive home we have a cup of coffee.I usually watch television until 9.30.I mostly enjoy watching a film.I go to bed after this.This is the usual time for children of my age(11yrs.).My Mum and Dad go to bed about 11.30pm.
